Calculate the Wakeunktion and write the result in a array.

Parameters:
Lbunch,: Number of points calculatet in the Wakefield
material,: The Material of the Wakefield. (either "Alu" or "Copper")
direction,: "Transversal" or Longitudinal"
mode,: "AC" or "DC"
a_Wake,: radius of the Tube [mm]
wake,: write the calculatet wake funktion in this array

mode,: "AC" or "DC"
